Quality Education.reason: Focus on learning law in Taiwanese enhances educational access.

提升說台語及以台語說明民法及其他法律的能力

Quality Education.reason: The course provides a unique educational opportunity to '以台語學習民法及其他法律' (learn civil law and other laws in Taiwanese), enhancing specialized knowledge and linguistic skills.

Gender Equality.reason: The course schedule includes '以台語學習民法親屬編' (learning the family law section of the Civil Code), which covers topics relevant to gender equality, though not explicitly stated.
evidence: 以台語學習民法親屬編

Decent Work and Economic Growth.reason: The course prepares students for legal professions such as '法官、檢察官、律師' (judge, prosecutor, lawyer) by improving communication skills necessary for their future work.
evidence: 法律系同學畢業後，不論擔任法官、檢察官、律師或其他法務工作，其實經常有必要以台語與他人溝通

Reduced Inequalities.reason: The course addresses linguistic inequality by promoting Taiwanese, a mother tongue where fluency has become '少見' (rare), to ensure better communication and access to justice for all.
evidence: 台語本來就是許多臺灣人的母語，但由於各種主、客觀因素，導致能說流利的台語，成為少見
經常有必要以台語與他人溝通
